pageContext.claim: “We have taken bold action to reduce the cost of prescription drugs. Drug prices are starting to come down, drug companies -- a number of months ago were going to raise their prices. I actually called up the heads of Pfizer, Novartis and others. I said, 'You can't do that. You can't raise your prices.' And you know what they did? They brought 'em down, they didn't raise them.”
pageContext.analysis: Pfizer did agree to a brief pause but did not say it would reduce prices. Then Pfizer announced it would raise prices on 41 prescription drugs as planned at the start of 2019.
